General.Name: Worldex Industry & Trading Co. Ltd
General.Description: Worldex Industry & Trading Co., Ltd. manufactures semiconductor and display materials, and consumable parts in South Korea. It offers silicon ingots, electrodes, rings, boats, and other parts; quartz rings, tubes, boats, and other parts; fine ceramics; and target, a physical vapor deposition material that is used for processes, including display sputtering as principal material of semiconductor wafer deposition and display parts, such as LCD, PDP, OLED, TSP, etc. The company's flagship products are silicon-parts for semiconductors, which are primarily used for etching processes in the semiconductor process. It also sells its products in the United States, Japan, Singapore, Taiwan, Europe, China, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Gumi, South Korea.
